Parlor! Mini 7: Pachinko Jikki Simulation Game

name: Parlor! Mini 7: Pachinko Jikki Simulation Game
summary: Pachinko game developed by Telenet Japan in 1997. The seventh of eight games in the Mini series, which focuses on two pachinko machines apiece.
